name: OneHundred (Abaris)
description:
OneHundred is a rage platformer, meaning you will die many many times before you complete the game. You wake up in a seemingly empty dungeon. You try to escape the dungeon, but the lock needs a key. Strangely, there is a demonic portal in front of it that seems to change the dungeon, make it even harder to maneuver.  The portal even doesn't allow you to save your progress.
Can you reach level 100, get the key, and finally escape from this hellish place?

After dozens of hours playing around in Unreal Engine, this is actually the first piece to get to the public, aka "my first game". Made for "My First Game Jam: Winter 2021" here on itch.io within 48 hours in Unreal Engine 4.26.
